title: Manage Sales Tax Exemption Certificates
description: A wholesale business needs to validate and manage sales tax exemption certificates from its reseller customers.

tasks.description: Receive a new exemption certificate from a customer.
Validate the certificate to ensure it is correctly filled out and not expired.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the certificate is valid.

tasks.description: Update the customer's account in the billing system to mark them as tax-exempt.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the customer's profile to prevent sales tax from being charged.
